long_description: No thicker than 3 quarters stacked together and weighing only 1 ounce, the Gerber STL 2.0 Fine Edge Knife rides comfortably in your pocket. STL stands for Strong, Thin and Light. Frame-lock design of the Gerber STL 2.0 Fine Edge Knife adds safety. Fine-edge, stainless-steel blade features a cutout that enables easy 1-handed opening. Ultra-thin, titanium-coated stainless-steel handle has a lanyard hole.
short_description: No thicker than 3 quarters stacked together and weighing only 1 ounce, the Gerber STL 2.0 Fine Edge Knife rides comfortably in your pocket.
